reviewText: the  5 star is for the seller, since they  ship the DVD from Italy it took a while, I contacted them . They were very friendly and courteous. The combination of 2 movies with such a low price is a great bargain. Now they are not masterpieces but fairly good soft core  movies, with plenty of sex and nudity . Both movies are in Italian with no subtitle. But they are easy to follow if you know a little Italian .
